alert.note: Alert for Switzerland (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 2:57PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN SWITZERLAND, CARROLL, WEST CENTRAL GRANT, NORTHWESTERN OWEN AND WESTERN GALLATIN COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM EDT... At 257 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Carrollton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Carrollton, Vevay, Owenton, Kentucky Speedway, Ghent, Sanders, Sparta, Worthville, Prestonville, Braytown, Interstate 71 at Mile Marker 52, Langstaff, Wheatley, Locust, Moorefield, New Liberty, Interstate 71 at Mile Marker 40, Interstate 71 at State Route 227, Long Ridge and English. This includes I-71 in Kentucky between mile markers 39 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for southeastern Indiana...and northern Kentucky. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
